author: The Wall Street Journal
description:
President Trump is replacing national security adviser Mike Waltz roughly a month after he put a journalist on a group text chat in which advisers discussed a sensitive military operation.⁠ Here are three reasons why Trump fired Waltz, but kept U.S. Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth.⁠

#Trump #Politics #Shorts
title: Why Trump Fired Waltz and Not Hegseth After "Signalgate"
